goal.natural_language: Walk into laundry room. Open washing machine door. Put dirty clothes into washing machine. Measure laundry detergent and place into washing machine. Turn dial to appropriate wash setting. Power on.

list.description: 完成主要任务: Walk into laundry room. Open washing machine door. Put dirty clothes into washing machine. Measure laundry detergent and place into washing machine. Turn dial to appropriate wash setting. Power on.
